a_sch_room01_eve01:
This microwave here is our little secret, got it?
The one in the cafeteria’s always being used.
a_sch_room01_eve03:
There sure are a lot of Pokémon running free
around campus. Just like these ones here!\c
They always seem to show up at mealtimes.
a_sch_room01_ni03:
I was getting a bit peckish and thought I’d come
by to whip up a snack for myself...\c
But maybe I’ll just buy something at the
school store?
